body.name: InnoGear Microphone Stand, Mic Stand Detachable Gooseneck Mic Floor Stand Height Adjustable from 32” to 70” with Weighted Round Base for Blue Yeti Blue Snowball Shure SM7B Shure SM58 Samson Q2U
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 53 mins
features: Height Adjustable & Stable: By adjusting the clutch, the height of this InnoGear mic stand is adjustable from 32 inches to 70 inches, used for person standing or sitting. Compared to other stands using three height clutches on the market, this stand uses only one height clutch and one separate extension pole which is connected by a long screw adapter to improve the stability.

Flexible Gooseneck: The gooseneck is 360° adjustable, being flexible to adjust for singing or for an instrument. It can be positioned at whatever angle you need it at. Meanwhile, it is of high quality and is sturdy enough to support your microphones. The included mic clip is able to be rotated by 180°.

Heavy-duty Round Base: The weighted round base of the mic stand weighs 4.5 Lbs in the diameter of 9.8 inches, being more stable and having larger bearing capacity, unlike other tripod stands. The bottom of base is built with 6 non-slip pads. An upgraded fixing loop is added between the connection of base and the boom stand to further enhance stability and avoid any wiggle.

Detachable & Portable Stand: This gooseneck floor stand can be disassembled into four parts in seconds. It is easy to carry and install which provides great convenience for various types of activities like stage, studio, road show, concert, outdoor performances and more.

Wide Compatibility: This upgraded mic stand fits for most types of microphones like HyperX QuadCast, Fifine K669B (Attention: Shock mount not included), Blue Snowball iCE, Blue Yeti, Audio-Technica AT2020, Audio-Technica AT2035, Samson Q2U, Razer Seiren X, Shure SM58, Shure PGA48, Shure SM7B and so on.
body.description: InnoGear Gooseneck Mic Floor Stand Flexible, Sturdy & Detachable InnoGear upgraded gooseneck microphone stand is solid and durable to use with its height adjustable from 32 inches to 70 inches, perfect for the sitting or standing users. The 14-inch long gooseneck is flexible to adjust the position of your microphones. Bending gooseneck provides lot of flexibility to use. Being able to be disassembled into four parts, the stand set is easy to transport and set up, suitable for many occasions such as stage, studio, street performance, etc. Plenty of adjustment range Flexible gooseneck Heavy-duty round base Detachable and portable Wide applications

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: InnoGear is a pioneer company in the art of aromatherapy, solar light and music accessories that will transform our routine life naturally. We continuously innovate to integrate nature and technology to provide comfortable, superior and straightforward products as we aim to help you spread care for your family. InnoGear Gooseneck Mic Floor Stand Flexible, Sturdy & Detachable InnoGear upgraded gooseneck microphone stand is solid and durable to use with its height adjustable from 32 inches to 70 inches, perfect for the sitting or standing users. The 14-inch long gooseneck is flexible to adjust the position of your microphones. Bending gooseneck provides lot of flexibility to use. Being able to be disassembled into four parts, the stand set is easy to transport and set up, suitable for many occasions such as stage, studio, street performance, etc. Plenty of adjustment range Flexible gooseneck Heavy-duty round base Detachable and portable Wide applications

Adjustable Height & Detachable By adjusting the height clutch, the boom mic stand is adjustable from 32 inches to 70 inches (connecting gooseneck and extension pole). Made of premium steel, the main pole is thickened to 1.2mm, compared to only 0.8mm of other mic stands on the market. Detachable and easy to carry. Flexible & Sturdy Gooseneck The length of the gooseneck is 14 inches and it is 360° adjustable and flexible, providing the capability to set up your microphone at any angle during the use. Quality made and strong enough to support your microphone. Weighted Round Base With the diameter of 9.8 inches and the weight of 4.5 Lbs, the base is heavy-duty, solid, and stable, not easy to tip over, compared to other tripod stands. It also features an upgraded fixing loop and 6 non-slip pads to further enhance stability.

Upgraded Connection & Cable Clips This stand has improved the connection to enhance stability, using only one height clutch and one separate extension pole which is connected by a long screw adapter, compared to others using three height clutches on the market. The package comes with three upgraded cable clips, durable and handy, unlike other frangible ones. Nice Microphone Clip The included mic clip is adjustable, being able to rotate 180°. You can adjust your desired angle of microphone easily. The max diameter of the clip is 1.3"/32mm, suitable for many microphones like Shure SM58, Samson Q2U, Shure PGA48, Shure SM7B and more. Wide Compatibility The package comes with one 3/8" to 5/8" screw adapter, in line with industry standards, and it works greatly with most microphones like HyperX QuadCast, Blue Yeti, Blue Snowball, Blue Snowball iCE, Fifine K669B (Shock mount not included).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Stand for a Good Price
reviews.reviewText: Great stand for the Price. I used the Gooseneck for a couple Tom Mics. Super sturdy.Easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the stability and the gooseneck so I can set the mic to the angle I prefer. I attach an iPad to the stand and the stand is still solid on stage. The round base was what I was looking for but this is so much more. Recommended. AAA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very useful for our purposes
reviews.reviewText: The mike holder choices did not fit our mike so adaptation was made. Otherwise the unit is good sized and works well with goose neck adapter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comes loose easily, but overall good stand
reviews.reviewText: Working as a music therapist at a hospital, this is a great mic stand for children of all heights. Adults may want something a little taller though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent price for a very valuable product
reviews.reviewText: I wish I'd have bought this last year because their gooseneck design is even more stable than the boom mic stand design which is sold at a more expensive price. The metal base has added pads to avoid the banging sound when you set it on the ground, which I think is nice. I sing at wedding masses, have my own mic and mic stand/music stand setup. This mic stand is my most favorite so far out of all the mic stands I own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mic stand
reviews.reviewText: I've tried quite a few different kinds of mic stands and this one I love:1. Breaks down into 5 pieces that fit into my gig back nicely2. Very sturdy and durable3. It can be assembled quickly and easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a good weight and is perfect for singing or using with any instrument whether standing or sitting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars -1 for sturdiness, but it's not a shock considering the base style
reviews.reviewText: round base style stand so of course it's not earthquake proof, but this thing is sweet nonetheless. I like this mic stand a lot!
